client

Class VicinityClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.VicinityClient

  • public class VicinityClient
extends java.lang.Object

    This class is allows discovering and accessing Things in the VICINITY cloud. However relies on an external module request data to the remote endpoints.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

      void close()
      This method cleans all the memory used by this class
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> discoverRelevantThingIRI()
      This method returns a list of Thing IRIs that where discovered in the TED and which RDF should be retrieved from the Semantic Repository

      This method specifies if there are still Things for discover within a provided TED

      This method returns the cached log for this method

      This method virtualizes the JSON data of the relevant Gateway API into RDF and solves a given query
      void updateDiscovery(java.lang.String jsonThing)
      This method updates the Things discovered allowing further discoveries

                      java.lang.String jsonPrefixes)
        Constructor of VicinityClient class
        Parameters:
        jsonTed - A JSON-LD document containing a TED
        neighbours - A set of neighbour oid
        jsonPrefixes - A JSON document containing the prefixes used by the VICINITY ontologies

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public void close()
        This method cleans all the memory used by this class

        public java.lang.StringBuilder getLog()
        This method returns the cached log for this method
        Returns:
        A log containing all the execution information of this class

      • existIterativelyDiscoverableThings

        public java.lang.Boolean existIterativelyDiscoverableThings()
        This method specifies if there are still Things for discover within a provided TED
        Returns:
        A boolean value that specifies if discovery should continue

      • discoverRelevantThingIRI

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> discoverRelevantThingIRI()
        This method returns a list of Thing IRIs that where discovered in the TED and which RDF should be retrieved from the Semantic Repository
        Returns:
        A list of Thing IRIs

      • updateDiscovery

        public void updateDiscovery(java.lang.String jsonThing)
        This method updates the Things discovered allowing further discoveries
        Parameters:
        jsonThing - A JSON-LD document containing a Thing information

      • getRelevantGatewayAPIAddresses

        public java.util.List<Triple<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> getRelevantGatewayAPIAddresses()
        This method finds the Gateway API Addresses that should be queried in order to complete the Things information
        Returns:
        A list of Triples in which the first element is a Thing IRI, the second an AccessMapping IRI related to the Thing, and the third is a Gateway API address containing relevant JSON data that should be virtualized into RDF

      • solveQuery

        public java.util.List<java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> solveQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                                                   java.util.List<Triple<java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String>> relevantGatewayApiData)
        This method virtualizes the JSON data of the relevant Gateway API into RDF and solves a given query
        Parameters:
        query - A SPARQL Query
        relevantGatewayApiData - A list of Triples in which the first element is a Thing IRI, the second an AccessMapping IRI related to the Thing, and the third is a JSON document exposed by a remote Gateway API that will be virtualized into RDF
        Returns:
        A set results for the given query as a List of Maps in which each key is a query variable and its related value the query solution for such variable
